login.terms: By signing in, you agree to our
login.forgot_header: What is your email? We will send you a link to reset your password.

demo_mode.text: Click here to begin tracking yourself with a 30-day trial.

tutorial.welcome: This is your personal Panopti dashboard where you can track and manage bol.com products.
tutorial.step2: Here, you can view all the products you're tracking. The table shows sales, revenue, and reviews over the selected date range. Click on a product to see the details!
tutorial.step3: The date range selection is done here! You can choose any period to inspect the revenue for that period.
tutorial.step4: Revenue is aggregated by day. When you start tracking a new product, it will take a few days before you see meaningful data. ⌛ Please keep this in mind.
tutorial.step5: All you need is its bol.com product URL as pictured, and a fun name of your choosing!
tutorial.step6: This list shows all the products you're tracking. You can click on a product to change its name or delete it.
tutorial.step7: Open this menu to add new products to track. All you'll need is its bol.com product page URL and a fun name of your choosing!
tutorial.step8:
Here, you can change your password, language 🌎, or theme 🎨.
You can also give feedback, log out, or restart the tutorial!
tutorial.step9:
Here, you can change your password, language 🌎, or theme 🎨.
You can also give feedback, log out, or restart the tutorial!
tutorial.done_1: Thank you for using Panopti! 💖
tutorial.done_demo: You're almost there! Enter your email to explore further.
tutorial.done_1_demo: Thank you for trying Panopti! 💖

pricing.pricing_text: Unlock unparalleled insights and take full control of your sales strategy with Panopti’s premium features. Get real-time data, compare your performance with competitors, and make informed decisions that drive growth.
pricing.pricing_demo_subtext: Explore our powerful features in action
pricing.pricing_disclaimer: Try 30 days before your first payment! Cancel anytime.
pricing.review_text: "I like Panopti because it’s simple and gives me the data I actually need to find products. Sure, it’s missing a few features, but for the price, it’s a really good deal."
pricing.referral_placeholder: Do you have a referral code? Enter it here!

landing.hero_header: Turbocharge your Bol.com sales with next-level product research
landing.hero_text: Imagine knowing exactly what products are flying off the shelves on Bol.com!
landing.hero_text2: With Panopti, you’ll track high-potential products and uncover hidden opportunities to boost your sales effortlessly and lead the market.
landing.demo_no_register: Try right away, no payment details required!
landing.free_trial: Subscribe later with a 30-day free trial ✨
landing.frustration_text: Ever experienced the frustration of investing time, effort, and energy into a product only for it not to sell? What a waste!
landing.tracker_text: With Panopti's product tracker and database, you can avoid that nightmare scenario.
landing.insights_text: Panopti lets you access detailed product performance stats, including sales data, pricing trends, and revenue insights.
landing.monitor_text: Monitor individual products, track their sales history over time, and come out on top!
landing.faq_question_1: How do you differ from other product research tools?
landing.faq_answer_1: We're focused solely on product research and are still in development, which means we're more affordable but may not have all the features yet. We're actively listening to customer feedback to build the perfect tool, with open communication channels for your input.
landing.faq_question_2: What is the cancellation notice period for Panopti?
landing.faq_answer_2: You can cancel at any time. Once canceled, your subscription will remain active until the prepaid period ends, with no further charges.
landing.faq_question_3: Is my data safe with you?
landing.faq_answer_3: Yes! We only collect your email and store it securely in an encrypted database, along with our product data. We prioritize your data's security and privacy.
landing.faq_question_4: How often is the research data updated?
landing.faq_answer_4: Product research data is updated once daily, using data samples gathered throughout the day to provide the most accurate insights.
landing.faq_question_5: I have further questions, how do I reach you?
landing.faq_answer_5: Feel free to reach out anytime at info@panopti.nl. We're happy to assist with any questions you have!
landing.footer_built_with: Built with ❤️ by the Panopti team.

unknown.error: An error occurred, please try again later.
unknown.server: Server is not responding, please try again later.
